summary: This code initiates the WeSee app, starts the GlobalSearchActivity, and inputs the search term "猫猫" before triggering a search with KEYCODE_ENTER.

details.comment: This code initiates the WeSee app, starts the GlobalSearchActivity, and inputs the search term "猫猫" before triggering a search with KEYCODE_ENTER.
details.content:
pkg="com.tencent.weishi"
act="com.tencent.oscar.module.discovery.ui.GlobalSearchActivity"
app.startActivity({root:true,
packageName:pkg,className:act,
action:"View"})
waitForActivity(act)
setText("猫猫")
KeyCode("KEYCODE_ENTER")
